metadata.title: CVE-2021-29961 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
When styling and rendering an oversized `<select>` element, Firefox did notapply correct clipping which allowed an attacker to paint over the userinterface. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 89.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-29961` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 89.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
firefox-geckodriver - 89.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 89.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '89.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.2').
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
